1.title: '57 Airbox Corvette

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: The 1957 Airbox Corvette featured a rare experimental cooling system. When one collector finds one of these rare Corvettes under debris in a Midwestern barn, he battles to restore it to its original condition.

2.title: Ferrari 412P

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: In the 1960's, the battle for racing dominance between Ford and Ferrari pushed both automakers to new heights. Out of this battle came the Ferrari 412P, one of the rarest cars ever.

3.title: Mormon Meteor

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: One man helped revolutionize the pursuit of the land speed record and changed the course of automotive history. The Mormon Meteor might be one of the world's most important cars.

4.title: '55 Chevy Biscayne

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: This ancestor of some of GM's most legendary cars was saved from destruction in the nick of time. Why did GM start to destroy its automotive legacy, and how did the Biscayne survive?

5.title: '62 Ferrari 330 GTO

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: A gorgeous example the last front-engine to be competitive in sports car racing, this red rocket didn't even complete its first lap in the 1962 Le Mans race before being knocked out of contention.

6.title: '39 Bugatti

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: This incredible Bugatti 57C with a custom body made it through World War Two only to be broken up and sold in two separate pieces. How was this priceless classic rediscovered and restored?

7.title: 57 Chevy El Morocco

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: For the first time ever, GM allowed an outsider to design a custom Chevy, and this rare 1957 Chevy is an example of what happens when beauty meets beast.

8.title: 33 Delage D8S Coupe

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: See the best of the 1933 Paris auto show, a luxury car that disappeared from history for over 40 years.

9.title: 37 Talbot Lago

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: One of France's most prestigious car companies, take a look at the Talbot Lago open model, influenced by the human shape.

10.title: 54 Cadillac Pininfarina

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Impressed by Pininfarina's work, a famous jazz music producer hired the Italian design shop to build a custom body for what emerged as a Cadillac Cabriolet.

11.title: 53 Buick Wildcat

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: Born to be Wild. The incredible true story of the 1953 Buick Wildcat Concept I.

12.title: 50 Allard J2

episode of.title: One of a Kind: Cars (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: The Allard name is legendary, revived to build just 100 J2 models around the world.
